attributes.action: Introduce a small yearly tax for all cyclists wishing to use the roads to help pay for their cycle lanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a motorist I have to pay a tax that contributes to the upkeep of the roads that cyclists can use without cost. If cyclists want to use the road network, and take up space that motorists can't use for cycle lanes, then why shouldn't they pay a small fee?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
